QuestData.Title: Won't Leaf Him to Die
QuestData.Description:
I may have done some wicked things in my past, but I won't leave dis guard to die.
Zulajin has taken a nasty bite outta Zaluto... and has also infected him with some weird voodoo.
But don't worry, because today is our lucky day. I have a plan to cure him. Dere are sweetleaf bushes nearby!
De leaves of dis bush are known for their healing properties. You get me some, and I will be able to save dis Zaluto.
It's de only chance we have!
